documentfields.medioclinic.doctor.Biography: Dr. Vick has a background in Emergency medicine and general medicine. He earned his degree at University of Toronto School of Medicine. He pursued his interest in minor surgery and received his General Surgeon certification at Royal College of Surgeons England. Dr. Vick enjoys the relationship building that general practice offers and uses this with a focus on disease prevention. Outside of medicine, Dr. Vick regularly participates in Ironman triathlons and enjoys spending time with his family.
